mRAcquisitionType._instruction: Add the type of sequence readout.

nonlinearGradientCorrection._instruction: Has this scan, been corrected for gradient nonlinearities by the scanner sequence?

pulseSequenceType._instruction: Add the type pulse sequence used for this scan.

sequenceName._instruction: Enter the sequance name for this scan.

mTState._instruction: Boolean stating whether the magnetization transfer pulse is applied.

spoilingState._instruction: Boolean stating whether the pulse sequence uses any type of spoiling strategy to suppress residual transverse magnetization.

parallelAcquisitionTechnique._ instruction: Enter the parallel acquisition technique sequance name for this scan. 'GRAPPA' for most Siemens machines and 'SENSE' for most Philips machines.
